body_html:
By the way, I think the check routine might not work on 32-bit architecture. It uses rbx and rdi registers, which I believe 64-bit registers, to investigate cpu features;

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_info.cc

Line 40 in 4ab2d85

asm("mov %%rbx, %%rdi\n" \

so checking cpu feature itself breaks the compilation process on 32-bit machine.

However, it does not matter because if __SSE__ is correctly disabled, then it is not called;

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc

Line 61 in 4ab2d85

#ifdef __SSE__
